product_name: The North Face Ruby Raschel Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Wind-resistant and lightly insulated, The North Face Ruby Raschel jacket is a comfortable soft shell perfect for outdoor activities in inclement weather. Soft-shell fabric offers durability, 4-way stretch and weather resistance. Silken raschel fleece lining provides light thermal warmth without bulkiness. Full-length front zipper features an interior draft flap to keep cool breezes out; hem cinches down to hold in warmth. The North Face Ruby Raschel Jacket for women has 2 zip handwarmer pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Wind-resistant and lightly insulated, The North Face Ruby Raschel jacket is a comfortable soft shell perfect for outdoor activities in inclement weather.
